name: NEW! Girlosophy: INSPIRE
description:
Format: Hardcover, 207 pages.
Availability: Ships immediately
The latest book in Anthea Paul's Girlosophy series, Girlosophy – INSPIRE was born from the idea that girls can use their creative sources - in particular art and photography - as an empowering tool.

As a visual journey that takes the reader across countries and experiences, Girlosophy –INSPIRE is designed to lift spirits, encourage thought and ignite a sense of adventure while promoting a new way of seeing the world. Curated by COFA masters graduates Anthea Paul and Geraldine Mills, Girlosophy – INSPIRE is created as a oracle of ideas, details, moods, words and images to be dipped into, over and over.

“At the heart of INSPIRE is a call to action to become a participant in the many scenes that unfold around you on a daily basis. Becoming aware of your surroundings is something that is at the core of photography. Observation is a process, not an event. “

From the Dalai Lama’s monks in India to the Burning Man festival in Nevada, the shrine at the Bali Memorial, a palm reader’s neon sign in Los Angeles and a moment on stage with Florence and the Machine; Girlosophy – INSPIRE fuses moments snatched through the lens into a stunning visual essay that lifts, as the title would suggest, and transcends as only a Girlosophy project can.

"...an oasis of empowering images of young women from all nationalities and faiths... visual feast of photographs"
Time Out on Girlosophy - INSPIRE

name: Girlosophy: The BreakUp survival Kit
description:
Format: Soft Cover, 223 pages
Availability: Ships immediately
If you’ve ever been in a relationship, ended one, had one ended on you or want to end one, then Girlosophy: The BreakUp Survival kit is for you. Bestselling girlosopher Anthea Paul puts her positive spin on the traumas of breakup, offering comfort and practical advice to guide you through the relationship wilderness.

Girlosophy: The BreakUp Survival Kit is divided into three sections – Body, Mind and Spirit to help you figure out how to change your physical, mental and spiritual gears and get your life back on track as soon as possible. In true girlosophy style, meditations, affirmations and an overview of the chakras are included to give you a focused approach to your healing. The 30 day breakup recovery program at the back of the book shows you how to work out a new daily routine for your new life.

DETAILS
Full colour design and printing (four colour process)
Semi gloss finish and high quality paper stock
High gloss soft cover
Gorgeous colour photography and illustrations
Pocket sized
ISBN: 1 74114 077 3
Testimonial:
'I owe my life to this book! It helped me close a huge chapter of my life and open the door to a completely new one! A year after my previous relationship broke down I went traveling to South America and met my (now) husband. I never would have been ready to make space in my life for my husband if I had not had the help of this book! It really helped me to clean out all the old baggage I was holding onto and make way for the beauty that was to come.....thanks so much girlosophy I owe you everything x x x'  - Amanda Roche, UK

name: The Girlo Travel Survival Kit
description:
Format: Soft Cover, 256 pages
Availability: Ships immediately
Thinking about travelling? Going away with friends or family on a big trip? However, whenever, wherever you're traveling The Girlo Travel Survial Kit is your guide to the crucial travel must-haves, must-sees, and must-dos before, during and after the trip. The 8th book in the Girlosophy series.

FEATURES
It’s an essential girlo travel checklist – everything from the inspirational to the practical.
It’s about helping you prepare for the experience, defining what you want to achieve and what sort of traveler you want to be.
It gives you practical advice on everything you need to know about packing, leaving, traveling and experiencing the world.
WARNING! This checklist contains things that may not be able to physically packed, like patience for instance, or good manners. Curiosity is mandatory. A steely determination helps. A willingness to be open to the experience. Courage is crucial. These are but a few of the essentials in The Girlo Travel Survival Kit.

DETAILS
Full colour design and printing (four colour process)
Semi gloss finish and high quality paper stock
High gloss soft cover
Gorgeous colour photography and illustrations
ISBN: 978 1 7415 376 9
9.5cm x 5.5cm

name: Girlosophy: Real Girls’ Stories
description:
Format: Soft Cover, 191 pages.
Availability: Ships immediately
Real Girls' Stories is the Girlosophy reportage book that focuses on girls and young women from around the world. Based on interviews and quotes from real girls, Girlosophy: Real Girls' Stories shines the spotlight on the experiences, thoughts, beliefs, hopes and concerns of girls in our midst as they face the reality of life as young women in the 21st century.

CONTENT

‘Girls don’t look in the mirror and ask, “What do I want for myself?” They look and wonder, “What do other people think?”’ – Jennifer, Canada

‘I didn’t grow up rich – I grew up in a trailer park. But visiting downtown L.A was a heavy experience when I first went there. It was an uneducated level of poverty that I had never seen before.’ – Michelle, USA

‘Be happy with what you have, you have enough.’ – See Dewi, Sri Lanka

‘All girls think they have to be beautiful. There’s this impression among girls that you can be the most successful person, but if you’re ugly, no one will care.’ – Ashley, Australia

DETAILS

Full colour design and printing (four colour process)
Semi gloss finish and high quality paper stock
High gloss soft cover
Gorgeous colour photography and illustrations
ISBN: 1 86508 906 0
23cm x 23.3cm

name: Girlosophy: Real Girls' Eat
Girlosophy / Moleskine Notebook
description:
Format: Hardcover
Availability: Ships immediately
Made in Italy
For those of us who love to take notes, Girlo presents the coolest notebook on planet earth. In our collaboration with the creator of the world’s most famous journals, Girlosophy joins the illustrious alumni of the creative world. Think of a person who created something amazing and the chances are they used a Moleskine journal or notebook to make it happen.

All the way from Italy, the brand new customised Girlosophy Moleskine Notebook is designed for your drawing, painting, recording, travelling organizing, planning and of course, your writing.

The Girlosophy Moleskine Notebook is the basic yet classic Pocket Ruled notebook. 

DETAILS
a cardboard bound cover with rounded corners;
made of acid free paper;
ruled throughout;
has a ribbon bookmark;
an elastic closure; and
has an expandable inner pocket that contains the Moleskine history
90mm x 140mm
All of those amazing details plus the front cover of the notebook is embossed with the fabulous GIRLOSOPHY logo and comes in scorchingly stylish Girlo Red for your extra-convenience (yes, you’ll be able to find it really easily in your bag or pack!)

Calling creative style mavens everywhere, the Girlosophy Moleskine Notebook is waiting for you!
